<a id="PinJoint3D"></a>

# PinJoint3D

**Inherits:** [Joint3D](Joint3D.md) **\<** [Node3D](Node3D.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A physics joint that attaches two 3D physics bodies at a single point, allowing them to freely rotate.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A physics joint that attaches two 3D physics bodies at a single point, allowing them to freely rotate. For example, a [RigidBody3D](RigidBody3D.md) can be attached to a [StaticBody3D](StaticBody3D.md) to create a pendulum or a seesaw.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_PinJoint3D_Param"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **Param**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_PinJoint3D_Param)

<a id="PinJoint3D_constant_PARAM_BIAS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Param](PinJoint3D.md#enum_PinJoint3D_Param) **PARAM_BIAS** = `0`

The force with which the pinned objects stay in positional relation to each other. The higher, the stronger.<a id="PinJoint3D_constant_PARAM_DAMPING"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Param](PinJoint3D.md#enum_PinJoint3D_Param) **PARAM_DAMPING** = `1`

The force with which the pinned objects stay in velocity relation to each other. The higher, the stronger.<a id="PinJoint3D_constant_PARAM_IMPULSE_CLAMP"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Param](PinJoint3D.md#enum_PinJoint3D_Param) **PARAM_IMPULSE_CLAMP** = `2`

If above 0, this value is the maximum value for an impulse that this Joint3D produces.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

## Property Descriptions

<a id="PinJoint3D_property_params/bias"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **params/bias** = `0.3` [ðŸ”—](#PinJoint3D_property_params/bias)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](PinJoint3D.md#enum_PinJoint3D_Param), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](PinJoint3D.md#enum_PinJoint3D_Param)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The force with which the pinned objects stay in positional relation to each other. The higher, the stronger.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PinJoint3D_property_params/damping"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **params/damping** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#PinJoint3D_property_params/damping)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- [float](float.md) **get_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](PinJoint3D.md#enum_PinJoint3D_Param)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The force with which the pinned objects stay in velocity relation to each other. The higher, the stronger.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>
